channel.title: Rooster Teeth on edel grace altares
channel.description: Recent content in Rooster Teeth on edel grace altares

item.title: Race Against Time
item.description: I missed yesterday as well. I’m just not very good at this! But I am determined not to miss today. Today I read on Zen Habits that you should never miss doing something two days in a row. It’s a good philosophy and a great motivation hack for me. By the time two days have passed, it’s very likely that that task will never be accomplished. So yes, it’s around 11:30pm and it takes me around half an hour to write at least 500 words.

item.title: BloWriMo & Rooster Teeth Extra Life 2013 (Image Heavy)
item.description: November is NaNoWriMo1. I know I will never be able to participate in NaNoWriMo. So I’m going to do BloWriMo: Blog Writing Month (which was technically last month, oops). Really lame, I know, but writing everyday is doable but at the same time, challenging. I’m aiming for at least 500 words everyday. Yesterday I only did around 440 words but that’s because I did not know that I was doing this.
